caption.p: NP-TLC chromatogram presenting the ginger extract developed in the mixture of methanol and dichloromethane (5:95 v/ v) after the acetylcholinesterase assay (A— ar-curcumene, B—α-sesquiphellandrene and C—α-zingiberene). The injection volume of the following spots, starting from the left: 3 mg/mL—15 µL, 2 mg/mL—10 µL, 1 mg/mL—5 µL, 0.5 mg/mL—2.5 µL.
